name: Hit Down
description:
Hit Down is a "2D platformer" game still in development (WIP). It's best playing it on a touchscreen but a PC version will be available in the long run.

You are a jumping ball. Your goal is to swipe on the screen in the matching direction to move the highlighted obstacles and avoid the ball from crashing.

The bêta version will embed a level editor ✌️ (WIP)

You can download and install the pre-alpha version in order to share feedbacks (those are so useful !💜)
